/*global Ext:false */
Ext.onReady(function () {
    Ext.create('Ext.panel.Panel', {
        title: 'Accordion Layout',
        width: 300,
        height: 300,
        defaults: {
            // applied to each contained panel
            bodyStyle: 'padding:15px'
        },
        layout: {
            // layout-specific configs go here
            type: 'accordion',
            titleCollapse: false,
            animate: true,
            activeOnTop: true
        },
        items: [{
            title: 'Panel 1',
            html: 'Panel content!'
        }, {
            title: 'Panel 2',
            html: 'Panel content!'
        }, {
            title: 'Panel 3',
            html: 'Panel content!'
        }],
        renderTo: Ext.getBody()
    });
});
